meanings.definition: In a smooth and continuous way, without any noticeable transitions or interruptions.
meanings.sent1: The music changed from one song to another seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the painting blended seamlessly together.
meanings.sent3: The magician seamlessly pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas seamlessly flowed from one to the next like a river.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved seamlessly across the stage, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is perfectly integrated or blended with something else.
meanings.sent1: The new software seamlessly connected to the existing system.
meanings.sent2: The flavors of the dish combined seamlessly, creating a delicious taste.
meanings.sent3: The actor seamlessly transitioned from one character to another on stage.
meanings.sent4: The friendship between the two children was seamlessly strong, like a bond of steel.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces fit seamlessly together, completing the picture.
